name: hadass
params: wff w0, wff w1, wff w2
body: |- wb(whad(w0, w1, w2), wxo(w0, wxo(w1, w2)))

stmt.origin: bitri(whad(w0, w1, w2), wxo(w0, wxo(w1, w2)), wxo(wxo(w0, w1), w2))

body.origin:
|- wb(whad(w0, w1, w2), wxo(w0, wxo(w1, w2)))
-| wb(whad(w0, w1, w2), wxo(wxo(w0, w1), w2))
-| wb(wxo(wxo(w0, w1), w2), wxo(w0, wxo(w1, w2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(whad(w0, w1, w2), wxo(w0, wxo(w1, w2)))
-| wb(whad(w0, w1, w2), wxo(wxo(w0, w1), w2))
-| wb(wxo(wxo(w0, w1), w2), wxo(w0, wxo(w1, w2)))

body.origin: |- wb(whad(w0, w1, w2), wxo(wxo(w0, w1), w2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(whad(w0, w1, w2), wxo(w0, wxo(w1, w2)))
-| wb(wxo(wxo(w0, w1), w2), wxo(w0, wxo(w1, w2)))

body.origin: |- wb(wxo(wxo(w0, w1), w2), wxo(w0, wxo(w1, w2)))

cumulated.origin: |- wb(whad(w0, w1, w2), wxo(w0, wxo(w1, w2)))

comment: Associative law for the adder sum. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 4-Sep-2016.)
